Flagler Beach Events
Monthly Happenings
There’s always something happening in and around our coastal gem of Flagler Beach. From vendor fairs, to live music, to sports, art, and cultural festivals — there’s always adventure around every corner.
Check back here often to stay informed about all the top Flagler Beach events, and plan your visit around the stops you most want to add to your itinerary.
Monthly:
Food Truck Tuesdays
: Every other month starting in March on the third Tuesday
Free Movies in Veterans Park
: Every second Friday
First Fridays in Flagler Beach
Second Saturday Plant Sale
Salt Air Farmers Market
: Every Sunday
Palm Coast Farmers Market
: Every Sunday
Stay Connected
Sign up for our newsletter, and you’ll be among the first to know our latest offers and updates.
*
Your Email:

Special Codes
Meetings & Events Near Orlando
Host Your Next Gathering
Every gathering is extraordinary at Compass Hotel by Margaritaville Flagler Beach.
Our Continental Drifter meeting room offers 481 sq. ft. of gathering space for up to 30 guests. As one of the most perfectly appointed event venues near Orlando, this stellar spot gives planners the flexibility to accommodate nearly any professional or social occasion. Your group will discover convenient amenities, delicious on-site dining, first-class services, available room blocks, state-of-the-art audio/visual presentation equipment, and inspiring area activities certain to turn any event into one to remember.
Reach out to a member of our team today and we’ll happily work with you to make your event truly special.

Meetings & Events Near Orlando
Host Your Next Gathering
Every gathering is extraordinary at Compass Hotel by Margaritaville Flagler Beach.
Our Continental Drifter meeting room offers 481 sq. ft. of gathering space for up to 30 guests. As one of the most perfectly appointed event venues near Orlando, this stellar spot gives planners the flexibility to accommodate nearly any professional or social occasion. Your group will discover convenient amenities, delicious on-site dining, first-class services, available room blocks, state-of-the-art audio/visual presentation equipment, and inspiring area activities certain to turn any event into one to remember.
Reach out to a member of our team today and we’ll happily work with you to make your event truly special.
